objects.specification: A continuous floor covering with a light wheat-colored finish and subtle wood grain texture, seamlessly spanning the entire classroom. The surface is smooth with a gentle sheen that reflects ambient light. It is made of durable materials suitable for high foot traffic, providing a warm and inviting base for the room.

A smooth pastel lavender wall with a matte finish, extending the full width and height of the front of the classroom. The surface is uniformly painted, providing a calm and inviting atmosphere. The edges are crisp and meet the floor and ceiling with clean lines.

A smooth pastel lavender wall with a matte finish, covering the entire back of the classroom. The surface is flat and even, with sharp edges where it meets adjacent surfaces. The uniform paint lends a serene backdrop for educational materials.

A smooth pastel lavender side wall with a matte finish, mounted flush with the ceiling and floor. Its uniform paint conveys a calm environment. The surface has no embellishments except for mounted windows and decor.

A smooth pastel lavender side wall with a matte finish, spanning the full height from floor to ceiling. The paint is evenly applied and free of texture variation. This surface serves as a backdrop for windows and educational posters.

A rectangular window with a thin white frame and a clear transparent glass pane divided into two panels. Each panel opens outward on hinges, allowing natural light and ventilation. The frame is sleek and modern.
A rectangular window with a thin white frame and clear glass pane in two outward-opening sections. The modern frame complements the pastel wall. It provides natural illumination and fresh air.
A rectangular window with a slender white frame and transparent glass divided into two outward-opening panels. The design is minimalist. It enhances daylight and air flow.
A rectangular window with a slender white frame and clear glass pane split into two hinged panels that open outward. The frame is unobtrusive. It admits natural light evenly.

A soft pastel pink fabric curtain gently gathered at the top with subtle pleats, hanging beside the window frame. The drape is lightweight and flows smoothly. It adds a warm decorative accent and can be drawn closed for privacy.
A soft pastel pink fabric curtain with gentle pleats, hanging beside the window. The material is light and semi-opaque, offering both decoration and moderate light control.
A pastel pink curtain with soft pleating, draped beside the window, made of lightweight fabric that adds a cozy feel. It hangs in gentle folds, ready to be drawn if needed.
A soft pastel pink curtain with delicate pleats, hanging beside the window frame. The fabric flows gently and softens incoming light.

A large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy white writing surface and a slim silver aluminum frame. The surface is smooth for dry-erase markers and erases cleanly. It is mounted securely on the wall above the teacher’s desk.

A large teacher’s desk in a light wood tone with a spacious, smooth tabletop and sturdy rectangular legs. The desk has clean modern lines and rounded corners for safety. Its finish reveals a subtle wood grain pattern, creating a professional yet warm focal point at the front of the classroom.

A comfortable swivel chair upholstered in blue fabric, featuring a padded seat and backrest with a subtle texture. It has armrests and a five-star rolling base for easy movement. The chair’s ergonomic curves support long periods of sitting.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector in light gray housing with a front lens and small ventilation grills. It has a slim, rectangular profile and projects a sharp, bright image onto the whiteboard. All cables are neatly concealed.

A rectangular recessed LED ceiling light panel with a diffused white cover and a thin profile. It emits uniform, soft light and is mounted flush with the ceiling. Its design is minimalist and efficient.
A sleek rectangular LED panel with diffused white glazing, flush-mounted in the ceiling. It provides bright, even illumination across the room. The panel housing is narrow and unobtrusive.
A slim LED ceiling light fixture with a frosted diffuser that spreads soft white light. The housing is narrow and contemporary. It integrates seamlessly into the ceiling plane.
A rectangular LED panel with a diffused white lens, recessed into the ceiling. The fixture is minimalistic and provides broad, even coverage. Its edges are crisp and clean.
A flush-mounted LED ceiling light with a subtle white diffuser that disperses soft, uniform illumination. The fixture profile is ultra-thin for a modern look.
A slim LED panel light with frosted cover, recessed in the ceiling. It offers consistent brightness and a clean geometric shape.

A tall bookshelf in light wood tones featuring five open shelves filled with colorful books and organized supplies. The frame is sturdy with clean straight lines. Each shelf has a slight lip to prevent items from sliding off.
A circular wall clock with a crisp white face, black Arabic numerals and slim black hands. It has a thin metal frame matching the decor. The design is minimalist and easy to read at a glance.
A cylindrical waste bin in light gray plastic with a smooth matte finish and an open top. The bin is lightweight yet sturdy, designed for everyday classroom waste.
A cylindrical recycling bin in light gray plastic with clear recycling symbol labeling. It features a smooth matte surface and an open top for easy disposal of paper.
A potted plant with lush green foliage in a simple ceramic pot. The leaves are glossy and varied in size. The pot has a neutral matte finish that complements the natural aesthetic.
A leafy green potted plant in a simple ceramic container, featuring vibrant foliage. The pot’s surface is smooth and understated. This adds a touch of life and color to the room.

A colorful educational poster featuring vibrant illustrations and clear text, mounted with a slim border. The graphics are bright and engaging, designed to attract student attention. The surface is matte to reduce glare.
A bright educational poster with engaging visuals and easy-to-read text, framed by a thin border. The illustration palette is varied and educational. The poster has a non-reflective finish.
A colorful poster displaying educational content with illustrations in bold colors, bordered by a slim frame. It has a matte surface to minimize reflections. The layout balances text and images.
An engaging educational poster with vibrant imagery and succinct instructional text. The poster is printed on non-glossy paper and mounted with a thin frame. It adds visual interest to the wall.
A colorful educational poster with bold diagrams and concise explanatory text, mounted in a slim frame. The surface is matte to reduce glare. It provides a stimulating visual reference.
An instructional poster featuring key concepts with bright graphics and clear labeling. The poster is laminated with a matte finish. It is eye-catching and educational.
A bright, educational poster combining engaging illustrations with clear bullet-point text. The print is matte and framed. The layout is balanced for easy reading.
An educational poster with vibrant visual aids and concise explanatory text, mounted in a simple frame. The paper is non-reflective and durable. It enhances the classroom learning environment.

children.specification: A small storage drawer that slides out smoothly from beneath the desk, matching the light wood finish. It features a recessed handle and a smooth interior surface for storing notebooks and supplies.

objects.specification: A rectangular student desk crafted in light wood tones with a smooth tabletop surface and sturdy square legs. It has clean, minimalist lines with slightly rounded edges, revealing a subtle wood grain pattern. The desk is designed for individual student use and includes an integrated under-desk storage compartment.

A student chair with blue fabric upholstery covering a padded seat and ergonomic backrest. The chair is supported by a durable metal frame with four slender legs and non-slip foot caps. The upholstery has a subtle texture and the backrest features a gentle curve for comfort.
